title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2795/98 of 22 December 1998 fixing the reference prices for fishery products for the 1999 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2795/98 of 22 December 1998 fixing the reference prices for fishery products for the 1999 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The reference prices for the 1999 fishing year for the products specified in Annexes I, II, III, IV(A) and (B) and V to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 shall be as shown in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1998.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 350, 31. 12. 1994, p. 15.
(3) See page 42 of this Official Journal.
(4) OJ L 197, 6. 8. 1993, p. 8.
(5) OJ L 85, 19. 4. 1995, p. 13.
